Movie.Title: Casablanca
Movie.Description: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not he should help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape French Morocco.
Movie.Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Movie.Description: World War II American Army Medic
Movie.Title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Movie.Description: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against
Movie.Title: Rang De Basanti
Movie.Description: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.
Movie.Title: Saving Private Ryan
Movie.Description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
Movie.Title: Seven Samurai
Movie.Description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.
